product_name: Primal Wear Sparrow Bike Jersey - Women's - 2010 Overstock
long_description: Take flight on your ride with the women's Primal Wear Sparrow Bike Jersey, which keeps you cool with a moisture-wicking fabric and ventilating hidden zipper. Double-knit polyester fabric wicks sweat off your skin and dries fast. Sublimated graphics are brilliantly bold and do not inhibit breathability. UPF 35 sun protection. Hidden 3/4-length front zipper; 3 back pockets. Droptail hem offers extended coverage in back; sport cut is not too tight and not too loose. Primal Wear Sparrow women's bike jersey sports raglan sleeves for full freedom of movement. Closeout.
short_description: Take flight on your ride with the women's Primal Wear Sparrow Bike Jersey, which keeps you cool with a moisture-wicking fabric and ventilating hidden zipper.
